feed.title: Some transcripts from the Scaling Bitcoin workshops

entry.title: Some transcripts from the Scaling Bitcoin workshops
entry.summary: During a discussion on the bitcoin-dev mailing list, Bryan Bishop mentioned that he had typed most of the words down while listening to some talks. This was acknowledged as hard work by Johnathan Corgan, who runs Corgan Labs, a company that provides SDR training and development services. The email also included a link to Corgan Labs' website.
